<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cast Out](/Feats.aspx?ID=3455) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 23</row>

**Archetype** [Exorcist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=171)

**Prerequisites**
[Exorcist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3454)

</column>

---

You attempt to cast a malevolent entity out of the creature or object it's possessing. Roll a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against the [possession](/Traits.aspx?ID=129) effect; you must be within 30 feet of the possessed creature or object to do so. Your counteract level is half your level rounded up, and your counteract modifier is your [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) modifier, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) modifier, or spell DC – 10, whichever is highest. If you succeed, the entity is driven out and can't attempt to possess that creature or object for 1 week. If you fail, the possessing creature is immune to your Cast Out for a year and a day.
name: Cast Out
